mapper.insert: insert into json_store(id,lat, lng, name, vicinity) values(seq_json_store.nextval , #{lat}, #{lng}, #{name}, #{vicinity})
mapper.select: select a.id,storename, address,tel, lat, lng, close, smoke, parking, pet, seat from c_store a left outer join c_option c on (a.id=c.id) where lower(storename) like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or address like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

select a.id,storename, address,tel, lat, lng, close,filename, filepath, smoke, parking, pet, seat from c_store a left outer join c_upload b on (a.id=b.id) left outer join c_option c on (a.id=c.id) where lower(storename) like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or address like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
select a.id,storename, address,tel, lat, lng, close, smoke, parking, pet, seat from c_store a left outer join c_option c on (a.id=c.id) order by id

select a.id,storename, address,tel, lat, lng, close,filename, filepath, smoke, parking, pet, seat from c_store a left outer join c_upload b on (a.id=b.id) left outer join c_option c on (a.id=c.id) order by a.id
select * from c_option left outer join c_store using (id) where smoke = 'O'
select * from c_option left outer join c_store using (id) where pet = 'O'
select * from c_option left outer join c_store using (id) where parking = 'O'
select id, storename, address, tel, close, userid, rcomment, score, writedate, reviewid,dbimgpath from c_store inner join c_review using(id) where id=#{id} order by writedate desc
mapper.delete: delete from c_bookmark where id =#{id} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into c_review(id,userid,rcomment,score,dbimgpath) values((select id from c_store where id =#{id}),(select userid from c_member where userid=#{userid}),#{rcomment},#{score},#{dbimgpath})
mapper.update: update c_review set rcomment=#{rcomment}, score=#{score} where reviewid=#{reviewid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from c_bookmark where id =#{id} and email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into c_upload(id,filename,filepath) values((select id from c_store where id= 1),#{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select d.userid,replace(d.dbimgpath, '\', '/') dbimgpath, r.id,r.reviewid from c_member d inner join c_review r on d.userid=r.userid
